name: Orange Creamsicle Handmade Soap
description:
This smells just like the orange creamsicle you would buy from the ice cream man in the summer and it would melt all down your hand. This soap wont melt though. Made from rich creamy goats milk. this soap has a nice rich scent and a good lather. Simple and dreamy.

7oz bar

name: Saop for oily, acne prone skin
description:
I used to work as a facialist in a day spa, and what I did is transform my recipie for the facial masque into a nice sized bar of soap. The base of this soap is a mix of clays and secret oils that are benificial to keeping oily skin clear. Good for daily use, gentle and wont leve your skin feeling dry and tight.
This listing is for one 7 oz bar.

name: Nothing But Natural Goatsmilk and Oats Soap
description:
This is a wonderful soap for those that love the feeling of all natural products. This soap is deeply soothing and full of rich milky moisture.

Materials used in the making of this rich creamy soap are:
Goats Milk
Certified Organic Oatmeal
Yogurt

This listing is for one 5 ounce bar of all natural soap.

name: Set of two Coconut Marshmallow feel good soaps
description: Here is a set of two little bars of this luxurious soap, great for your guest bathroom or to try out our soaps. This is a really cute bar that says "Feel Good" as you will when you use this soap. The letters give you a little massage to stimulate circulation, leaving your skin healthy looking and smooth.
